Title: Trapped Inside
Writer: James Eagan, Sam Raimi (based on characters created by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by), William Bromell (story editor)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Michelle Hurd
Plot: An angry mob corners Ash and the team in Brock's house while Ruby tries to summon the spell to send Baal back to hell. Ash finally proves to the townsfolk he is not a murderer but a hero, when a familiar deadite comes for him.
